faculties_accepted: Faculty of Engineering & Design (CDE or FoE)
module_restrictions: Postgraduate modules are not open to undergraduate exchange students
visa_info: UK Visa and Immigration updates their immigration policy regularly. It is the student’s responsibility to check on the requirements via their website before they leave for the exchange.
accommodations_info: Exchange students can choose between two city centre locations: Pulteney Court and Thornbank Gardens. You can check accommodation prices for exchange students here. For more information on housing, please refer here.
cost_of_living:
The estimated living expenses per semester are as follows:

- Accommodation: £550 - £700 per month in our student residences
- Food: £250
- Transport: £200/semester (bus from city center to University)
- Insurance: [link to healthcare in the UK as an international student]
- Others (Entertainment, clothes, mobile phone, utilities, books etc.): £300

The estimated cost per month is £1150.
